question: What is the effect of incorporating  degree‐heterogeneous networks structure in an SEIR model on disease dynamics, compared to a homogeneous‐mixing network? Analyze it using both deterministic analytical methods and stochastic simulations
next_plan: Completed discovery and network construction; computed degree statistics for homogeneous (Erdős-Rényi) and heterogeneous (Barabási-Albert) networks, and derived beta values to maintain R0=2.5 in each. Next iteration, I will 1) implement SEIR model schema in FastGEMF, 2) run stochastic simulations on both networks (multiple repetitions) and deterministic mean-field ODEs, saving results to output/results-11.csv/png and output/results-12.csv/png, 3) analyze metrics (peak prevalence, final size, outbreak probability, epidemic duration) and summarize findings, and 4) draft the full LaTeX report.
